overview.en: Celer Network is a layer-2 scaling platform to build fast, easy-to-use, low-cost and secure blockchain applications at internet scale using off-chain scaling techniques and incentive-aligned cryptoeconomics.
overview.zh: Celer Network是一个二层扩容平台，通过新颖的链下扩容技术和加密经济学模型，帮助区块链应用极大地降低交易手续费和延迟，达到传统互联网的规模和体验。
